jparsec.io

Class Zip

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.io.Zip

  • public class Zip
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to (un)compress files using java zip support and static methods.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ZIP_SEPARATOR
      The file separator for zip files.

    • Field Detail

      • ZIP_SEPARATOR

        public static final java.lang.String ZIP_SEPARATOR
        The file separator for zip files.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • unZipFile

        public static java.lang.String[] unZipFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                           java.lang.String destDir,
                           boolean createNecessarySubdirs)
                                    throws JPARSECException
        Unzips a given zip file and returns the list of files inside it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File to unzip.
        destDir - Destination directory of the unzipped files. Null will create no files, useful to just get the contents inside it.
        createNecessarySubdirs - True to create any necessary subdirectories, false to avoid doing that, which will prevent for unzipping any file outside the already existent subdirectories.
        Returns:
        The set of content files in the zip file.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • zipFile

        public static void zipFile(java.lang.String fileName,
           java.lang.String[] filesToAdd)
                    throws JPARSECException
        Compress a set of files. If the file name to create has the same name and path as any of the input files to zip, that file will be skipped (not added) and overwritten.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Zip file to create.
        filesToAdd - A set of files (full paths) to write.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • zipDirectory

        public static void zipDirectory(java.lang.String fileName,
                java.lang.String path)
                         throws JPARSECException
        Compress a given directory and its contents, up to the fifth subdirectory level.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Zip file to create.
        path - Path of the directory to compress.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        For unit testing only.
        Parameters:
        args - Not used.
